start.text: This is a simple telegram chat bot (STCHB), written in Go (Golang) for a fun using "Go Telegram Bot API". For help "/help".

help.text:
This is a simple telegram chat bot, written in Go(Golang) for a fun using "Go Telegram Bot API".

âš™You can setting up your age, city or interlocutor - "/settings".

💬"/start_chatting" - to start a conversation with a random person.
💬"/stop_chatting" - to stop a conversation.

📁"/me" - to see information about yourself.

chat.interlocutor_search_begun: THE SEARCH FOR THE INTERLOCUTOR HAS BEGUN...
chat.not_in_chat: YOU ARE NOT IN THE CHAT YET...
